translations: 纯以灰色的装饰画法；纯灰色画

sentences.sentence: The Catherine the Great Egg (or The Grisaille Egg), four-color gold, diamonds, pearls, 1914. Presented by Nicholas II to Dowager Empress Maria Fyodorovna. Hillwood Museum, Washington, DC, USA.
sentences.translation: 凯瑟琳大帝彩蛋，四色黄金，钻石，珍珠，由尼古拉二世在1914年献给母亲马利亚。现存美国华盛顿的好莱坞博物馆。
